column1: Smoque BBQ////Can't be a great entree without some yummy sides to go with.  Baked mac and cheese
column2: coleslaw and corn bread are my choice sides.  The slaw isn't creamy at all
column3: it's has more of a vinaigrette kick to it.  Make room for dessert or at least order it to go because the peach cobbler is a MUST.
